originalText.text: Quick response and quick scheduling of work.  The job (replacement of water heater) was done efficiently and professionally.  Bruno doesn't seem to waste anyone's time and he gets the job done.  Reasonable prices, too.

text.text: Quick response and quick scheduling of work.  The job (replacement of water heater) was done efficiently and professionally.  Bruno doesn't seem to waste anyone's time and he gets the job done.  Reasonable prices, too.

originalText.text: Submitted my ticket via YELP and got a response within 6 minutes.  We talked on the phone, confirmed an appt for the next morning - a Sunday - he was on time, fixed my two issues at a fair price and within an hour.  Very pleased with the service.  Would definitely use again and also recommend.  Thank you, Bruno.

originalText.text: Bruno was communicative about his arrival time. He assessed my heating issues and gave great solutions to fix the problems.

originalText.text: Bruno responded quickly and replaced a circulator on my boiler.  Fair price and great service.  Thank you.

originalText.text: Bruno was on time and did a GREAT job repairing my shower!!! He is the best!!!
